# languageIdentifier

**Instance Property**

Returns the identifier for the language part of the locale. For example, returns “en-US” for “en_US@rg=gbzzzz”  locale.

## Declaration

```swift
var languageIdentifier: String { get }
```
title: languageIdentifier
